channel.title: My idea for a Fallout 3 Mod
channel.description:
For those of you unfamiliar with the basics of Fallout 3, in the free roaming post apocalyptic world, there are "pre-war" Vaults accessible through game, which takes place about 300 years from now.
SO! Onto business! In some Vault, that would be applied when the mod is installed, you'd find nothing but computers. All with Source SDK. Once the player investigates what everything is for, an entire Vault Society has been dedicating each generation to the development of what is called "Black Mesa" for 300 years.
There will be plenty of Source SDK computers, as well as the occasional restaurant, and a Church with a giant Stain glass image of Raminator's Profile Picture, and statues of other "original" dev team members.
(This is fake of course, its just a funny idea I came up with)
So, what do you guys think? What would actually happen in this "mod"?

item.title: My idea for a Fallout 3 Mod
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
Nerdguy:

Crowbar

NICE!

geekofalltrades:

“joke” = ruined

We need that one member’s sig about pointing jokes out.

Read full topic
item.source: My idea for a Fallout 3 Mod

item.title: My idea for a Fallout 3 Mod
item.dc:creator: Razor
item.description:
It would be funny if it turns out that Black Mesa will only be available on a computer within a Fallout 3 mod as a mini game.

Actually, that would be very annoying…

Oh what could it be?

Crowbar

That would be funny though. Selecting the option to say “So, when is Black Mesa Coming out?” Immediately makes everyone in the Vault your enemy.

dinnsfire5:

Sorry. I didn’t know someone else posted it. It was just something I thought about.

Ramirezoid:

Can I just say that you didn’t steal this from anyone and we totally pranked you hardcore

Ryλn:

It was mine. fucking thief.
[ COLOR=‘black’]LOLOLOLOLO I DIDNT DO SHIT[/COLOR ]

damn black text is hard to read trollface

item.title: My idea for a Fallout 3 Mod
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
I think it’s an awesome idea.
Also the twitter feed should be there: last update 110000 days ago
The vault should also be populated with the offspring of the current forumites, so that when you enter the vault for the very first time and dare ask for the release date would make them go apeshit and hostile. Or nostalgic, it’d be like the good old times.

Read full topic

item.title: My idea for a Fallout 3 Mod
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
dinnsfire5:

For those of you unfamiliar with the basics of Fallout 3, in the free roaming post apocalyptic world, there are “pre-war” Vaults accessible through game, which takes place about 300 years from now.

SO! Onto business! In some Vault, that would be applied when the mod is installed, you’d find nothing but computers. All with Source SDK. Once the player investigates what everything is for, an entire Vault Society has been dedicating each generation to the development of what is called “Black Mesa” for 300 years.

There will be plenty of Source SDK computers, as well as the occasional restaurant, and a Church with a giant Stain glass image of Raminator’s Profile Picture, and statues of other “original” dev team members.

(This is fake of course, its just a funny idea I came up with)

So, what do you guys think? What would actually happen in this “mod”?

Shit devs, you want some ointment for that buuurrrrnnnn?
